derivation: from G1 (ἀγνοέω) (as a negative particle) and G3539 (ἀγνοέω);
kjv_def: (be) ignorant(-ly), not know, not understand, unknown
strongs_def: not to know (through lack of information or intelligence); by implication, to ignore (through disinclination)
outline:
1. to be ignorant, not to know
  2. not to understand, unknown
  3. to err or sin through mistake, to be wrong
